TopicTitle: 1.0.2 Comms DTS-1M Infinitely spawning on runway when mounted on plane

Articles.Content:
Ass you can see below, the antenna spawns in the same place infinitely, with new ones coming in the same spot while the older ones..float up.

The mods I have installed are: KAS, KER, Kerbal Joint Reinforcement, MechJeb2

Any help fixing this would be very appreciated.
